mapper.insert: insert into CreditLoanBase (comNum, prdNum, comName, prdName, crdtTypeName, cbName, dclsStart) values (#{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{comName}, #{prdName}, #{crdtTypeName}, #{cbName}, #{dclsStart})

insert into CreditLoanOption (comNum, prdNum, crdtLendRateTypeName, crdtGrade9Up, crdtGrade8Up, crdtGrade7Up, crdtGrade6Up, crdtGrade5Up, crdtGrade4Up, crdtGrade3Up, crdtGrade3Down, crdtGradeAvg) values (#{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{crdtLendRateTypeName}, #{crdtGrade9Up}, #{crdtGrade8Up}, #{crdtGrade7Up}, #{crdtGrade6Up}, #{crdtGrade5Up}, #{crdtGrade4Up}, #{crdtGrade3Up}, #{crdtGrade3Down}, #{crdtGradeAvg})
